base.name: BatteryCell
base.description: Single cell of a chemical battery like a Lithium-Ion, Lithium-Polymer, NiCad, NiMH, or Lead-Acid.

parameter_definitions.name: R
parameter_definitions.description: Internal Resistance (Ohms). Must be negative even though the parameter is positive, compiler expects the negative of the parameter value.

parameter_definitions.name: B
parameter_definitions.description: Exponential zone time constant inverse (1/Ah). Must be negative even though the parameter is positive, compiler expects the negative of the parameter value.

parameter_definitions.name: intial_SOC
parameter_definitions.description: Initial value of the Depth of Discharge.
